_comment: Only needed if project has premine/ICO/presale
Delete all lines starting with '_comment' before submitting
_comment_project: Must match project name in main JSON
_comment_has_premine: Set to true if tokens minted at genesis (time-locked or immediate)
_comment_has_emission: Set to true if treasury/foundation receives block reward emissions
_comment_dev_tax: true if ongoing % of block rewards go to team (no end date)
_comment_total_pct: Total % allocated at genesis (before any mining/staking)
_comment_mining_pct: % available for public mining/staking at launch

dev_tax._comment_pct: If block_reward_split, what % of each block goes to devs
dev_tax._comment_duration: How many blocks dev tax continues. Use null for permanent
dev_tax._comment_recipient: Address or multisig receiving dev tax
dev_tax.notes: 10% of block rewards for first 2 years to dev fund

suspected_insider_mining._comment_insider: Use this section if fair launch but suspected early advantage
suspected_insider_mining._comment_enabled: Set to true only if credible evidence exists
evidence: Hashrate spikes to 1.2 TH/s in first week despite no ASIC availability
Single address accumulated 450M tokens in first 3 months
Network hashrate dropped 60% after month 4 (suspected rented hashrate)
suspected_insider_mining._comment_evidence: List specific on-chain or circumstantial evidence
suspected_insider_mining._comment_verifiable: true only if proven on-chain (clustering analysis)

allocation_tiers._comment_tiers: Organize allocations by category using this tier system

tier_1_profit_seeking._comment_tier1: VCs, seed investors, team with direct profit motive

buckets.name: Seed Round 1
buckets._comment_cost: Price paid per token. Use 0 for team grants
buckets._comment_cliff: Months before first unlock. Use 0 for no cliff

known.name: Polychain Capital
known._comment_investor_pct: % this investor owns of THIS round

investors.notes: Announcement stated '15 investors including Polychain and Multicoin' - individual allocations not disclosed

tier_2_entity_controlled._comment_tier2: Foundation, treasury, dev company - entity-controlled but not direct profit

tier_3_community._comment_tier3_note: Use 0 if no true community distribution

vesting_waterfall._comment_source: Which buckets contribute to this unlock

_comment_waterfall: Monthly unlock schedule. Critical for understanding sell pressure!
